message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you the product for $12,000. I believe it would be a valuable asset to you.
I appreciate your offer, but I'm looking to save as much as possible. I'm willing to pay $9,000 for the product.
Thanks for your offer, Bob. I understand your position, but I'm looking for a price closer to $11,000.  Would you be willing to meet me halfway?
I'm still a bit hesitant about the price. I'm willing to pay $9,500 for the product.
